DataElement.preferredName: Work Or Study Classmate Comparison Need Assistance Frequency_5PointScale
DataElement.preferredDefinition: A person"s stated perception of how often they need more help with school work than others in their class, using a 5-point likert scale.

DataElementConcept.preferredName: Work Or Study Classmate Comparison Need Assistance Temporal Frequency
DataElementConcept.preferredDefinition: Exertion or effort directed to produce or accomplish something.:An article used to connect words, phrases, or clauses representing alternatives; used to connect alternative terms for the same thing; used in correlation; used to correct or rephrase what was previously said; otherwise.:A detailed examination, analysis, or critical inspection of a subject designed to discover facts about it._A member of the same class at school.:The examination of two or more people or things in order to detect similarities and differences.:Anything that is necessary but lacking; the psychological feature that arouses an organism to action toward a desired goal; the reason for the action; that which gives purpose and direction to behavior.:The act of contributing to the fulfillment of a need or furtherance of an effort.:The number of occurrences of something within a given time period.

ConceptualDomain.preferredDefinition: Default Conceptual Domain for UML Loader

ValueDomain.preferredDefinition: Five-point Likert scale representing how frequently something happens.

ValueMeaning.preferredDefinition: The continuum of experience in which events pass from the future through the present to the past.:To a complete degree or to the full or entire extent.

Concepts.definition: To a complete degree or to the full or entire extent.
The continuum of experience in which events pass from the future through the present to the past.

ValueMeaning.preferredDefinition: The continuum of experience in which events pass from the future through the present to the past.:Greatest in amount, extent, or degree; constituting a majority.

Concepts.definition: Greatest in amount, extent, or degree; constituting a majority.
The continuum of experience in which events pass from the future through the present to the past.

ValueMeaning.preferredDefinition: No person or thing, nobody, not any.

Concepts.definition: No person or thing, nobody, not any.

ValueMeaning.preferredDefinition: An indefinite but relatively small number.:The continuum of experience in which events pass from the future through the present to the past.

Concepts.definition: An indefinite but relatively small number.
The continuum of experience in which events pass from the future through the present to the past.

ValueMeaning.preferredDefinition: The continuum of experience in which events pass from the future through the present to the past.:At least a small amount or number of.

Concepts.definition: At least a small amount or number of, but not a large amount of, or often.
The continuum of experience in which events pass from the future through the present to the past.
